name: PATIENT_CONF_ADDR
description: This table contains the patient's confidential address information.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient record.

columns.name: CONF_CITY
columns.description: The city associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the state that is associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the country that is associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_ZIP_CODE
columns.description: The Zip Code that is associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_CONTACT_PERSON
columns.description: The name of the person who should be contacted at the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_START_DATE
columns.description: The date in which the patient's confidential address should take effect for the patient.

columns.name: CONF_END_DATE
columns.description: The date in which the patient's confidential address should expire for the patient.

columns.name: CONF_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the county that is associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number associated with the patient's confidential address.

columns.name: CONF_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the district that is associated with the patient's confidential address.
